properties.areaDesc: East Columbia River Gorge; Eastern Columbia River Gorge of Washington
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 17 at 9:02PM PST until January 18 at 3:00PM PST by NWS Pendleton OR
properties.description:
...MORE SNOW OVERNIGHT AND SATURDAY...

.A warm front will move into the region overnight bringing
another round of snow. The east slopes of the Washington Cascades
from the Columbia River Gorge northward will be most impacted.

* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations around 2 inches.

* WHERE...In Washington, Eastern Columbia River Gorge of
Washington. In Oregon, East Columbia River Gorge.

* WHEN...From midnight tonight to 3 PM PST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 3 PM PST SATURDAY
